articles.title: EU rejects UK compromise over Northern Ireland Protocol - RTE.ie
articles.description: The European Commission has rejected a UK compromise proposal on the Northern Ireland Protocol that would require the EU to take a more flexible approach to the issue of food safety and animal health, RTÉ News understands.
